name: Chaos Festival
description:
Simple 3rd person shooter with high score. Let's see what you can get from chaos. Remember it's not a pit, it's a ladder ;)

Controls:

Left-Click to Shoot

R to reload

WASD or Arrows to move

PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Credits:

UI / UX Programming:  https://toastyplanetgames.itch.io/

Level Design and AI Programming: https://geqwe.itch.io/

Programming: https://potatoisgreat.itch.io/
